Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 13th overall pick, by Colorado in 2010...
Injured on 4/30/2011 with a Fractured Nose, out for 6 days...
Traded from Colorado to Detroit on 2/12/2012 (Going to DET: C B. Davis, 3B N. Castellanos, P S. Sidwell. Going to COL: P S. Romo)...
Had first career hit on 4/8/2014, off Donald Baker (KCA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/25/2014, off Chien-Ming Wang (SEA)...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Milwaukee on 6/6/2014...
Was selected to the 2014 Allstar game...
Drove in 8 runs against Cleveland on 9/12/2014...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/7/2017, hitting .414 with 4 HR, 12 RBI...
Won World Championship with Detroit in 2017...
Drove in 6 runs against Seattle on 6/21/2019...
Drove in 6 runs against Cleveland on 4/21/2020...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/25/2020, hitting .625 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against Atlanta on 5/30/2020...
Hit for the cycle against Minnesota on 6/20/2020...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/27/2020, hitting .583 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2022 Allstar game...
